QuestData.Title: What Strange Creatures...
QuestData.Description: I am interested in learning more about the strange reptiles that mill about the lava flows of Shadowmoon Valley. Never have I seen beasts able to withstand the searing heat of molten lava!$B$BOutside of Shadowmoon Village, where the ground has ruptured and lava flows through the cracks, you will find felfire diemetradons. Slay them and bring me their spleens. From their spleens I will be able to begin preliminary analysis of their resistance to heat.$B$BBegin your search to the southeast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Researcher Tiorus at Shadowmoon Village in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to recover 8 Felfire Spleens.
QuestData.RewardText: This may take a while. Take these coins for your hard work.
